Description.Title: soil temperature model
Description.ExtendedDescription: This component simulates daily soil temperature. It computes canopy temperature amplitude from daily minimum and maximum canopy temperatures, propagates it through the soil profile at 1-cm resolution using exponential damping with depth and a relaxation toward canopy temperature, aggregates temperatures to user-defined soil layers, and updates previous state variables. Initialization sets the initial profile and canopy temperature from the first-day air temperature and layer thickness.
Description.ShortDescription: Daily soil temperature profile and layer means driven by canopy temperatures with state update.

Input.name: prev_temp_profile
Input.description: Previous soil temperature profile (1 cm layers)

Output.name: temp_profile
Output.description: Current soil temperature profile (1 cm layers)

Function.name: init_temp_profile
Function.description: Initialization of soil temperature profile and previous canopy temperature.

Function.name: model_temp_profile
Function.description: Main process computing soil temperature profile using exponential damping with depth and temperature drivers.
